item.title: Holy Water Joe
item.description: Holy Water Joe is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Gariazzo.

item.title: Apache Woman
item.description: Apache Woman is a 1976 Italian Spaghetti Western film, written and directed by Giorgio Mariuzzo.

item.title: Roy Colt and Winchester Jack
item.description: Roy Colt & Winchester Jack is a 1970 Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Bava.

item.title: Sartana in the Valley of Death
item.description: Sartana in the Valley of Death is a 1970 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Roberto Mauri and starring William Berger.

item.title: His Name Was King
item.description: His Name Was King is a 1971 Italian Western film directed by Giancarlo Romitelli and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Return of Shanghai Joe
item.description: Return of Shanghai Joe is a 1975 Western film directed by Bitto Albertini and starring Klaus Kinski.

item.title: Drummer of Vengeance
item.description: Drummer of Vengeance is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Mario Gariazzo and starring Ty Hardin, Rossano Brazzi and Craig Hill.

item.title: Adiós, Sabata
item.description: Adiós, Sabata is a 1970 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Gianfranco Parolini. It is the second film in The Sabata Trilogy by Parolini. Yul Brynner takes over the lead role from Lee Van Cleef, who stars in the first and third films.

item.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
item.description: Sartana's Here… Trade Your Pistol for a Coffin is a 1970 spaghetti western that is the third of the Sartana film series with George Hilton taking over the lead role from Gianni Garko. The film was shot in Italy and directed by Giuliano Carnimeo.

item.title: Faccia a faccia
item.description: Face to Face is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film co-written and directed by Sergio Sollima. The film stars Gian Maria Volontè, Tomas Milian and William Berger, and features a musical score by Ennio Morricone. It is the second of Sollima's three Westerns, following The Big Gundown and predating Run, Man, Run, a sequel to the former. Milian stars in a lead role in all three films.
